items.title: Quack AI 1.0
items.info:
Reward Confirmed

Quack AI is the first AI protocol for universal on-chain governance.

Cost: $0 Free
Funding: TBD
Backers: CARV Labs, zk Link, Scalling Labs and more...

$AIQ points, redeemable for $AIQ tokens at TGE!

Reward Structure

Regular User
20 points per chat
Max: 5 chats per day

SBT Holder
50 points per chat
Max: N × 10 chats per day (N = number of SBTs held)

Example: If you hold 1 SBT, you can earn points from 10 chats per day (10 × 50 = 500 points/day).

More details here:
https://medium.com/@quackai/quack-ai-1-0-is-live-earn-while-you-chat-invite-and-build-the-future-of-ai-governance-8113a06245d8

items.title: Prior Incentive Testnet V1

steps.text: Complete All Tasks One by One
Answer the quest and score atleast 8/10

items.info:
Make sure to switch to Base Sepolia when claiming faucet. Answer Academy Quiz :  
1. What are the key components of the AYO (Automated Yield Optimization) engine?
Data Aggregation, AI Decision Engine, Smart Contract Execution Layer
2. What problem does Prior Protocol aim to address in the DeFi sector?
All of the above
3. How does Prior Protocol plan to expand in the future?
By expanding to multiple EVM-compatible chains and launching Prior Network
4. Which blockchain network is Prior Protocol initially launched on?
Base Network
5. What is the role of AI in the Prior Protocol?
All of the above
6. How does Prior Protocol minimize risks for users?
By using predictive analytics
7. What feature does Prior Protocol's cross-chain integration provide?
All of the above
8. What type of governance model does Prior Protocol use?
NFT-based decentralized governance
9. What is the main function of $PRIOR token in the ecosystem?
Governance, staking rewards, and transaction fee payments
10. What is the primary mission of Prior Protocol?
To simplify DeFi participation using AI for yield optimization

steps.text: Faucet - verify, go to faucet and claim 1000 usdc and 0.01 $WBTC daily using the command /faucet

Stake - you can stake sepolia Eth to $RETH or stake $WBTC to $RBTC. After staking you  you can only unstake after 14 days
Add Lp -you can also Provide Liquidity with $USDC to $R2USDC and $R2USDC to $SR2USDC
